mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_NO AS commentNo , NOTICE_NO AS noticeNo , USER_NO AS userNo , CONTENT AS content , CREATE_DATE AS createDate FROM CP_NT_COMMENT c JOIN CP_USER u ON u.USER_NO = c.USER_NO JOIN CP_NOTICE n ON n.NOTICE_NO = c.NOTICE_NO WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CP_NOTICE SET IS_ACTIVE = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
